title: FileUploadAll
name: FileUploadAll
description: Uploads file to a directory on the server.

arguments.name: destination
arguments.description: Absolute pathname of directory or file on web server.

arguments.name: accept
arguments.description:
Limits the MIME types to accept. Comma-delimited list. For example, to permit JPG and Microsoft Word file uploads:
accept = "image/jpg, application/msword"
The browser uses file extension to determine file type.

arguments.name: nameConflict
arguments.description: Action to take if filename is the same as that of a file in the directory.

arguments.name: mode
arguments.description: Applies only to Solaris and HP-UX. Permissions. Octal values of UNIX chmod command. Assigned to owner, group, and other, respectively.

arguments.name: attributes
arguments.description:
One attribute (Windows) or a comma-delimited list of attributes (other platforms) to set on the file.
If omitted, the file's attributes are maintained.
